Detailed Description

Indicator that displays an icon and text.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

IconTextIndicator::IconTextIndicator (   )  [inline]
 

Constructs an IconIndicator object with the given icon, position, and alignment. If no icon is set, the indicator will be invisible.

void IconTextIndicator::SetIcon (  const BitmapRes *  icon  )  [inline]
 

Sets the icon for this indicator. If the icon is set to 0, the Indicator will be invisible.

void IconTextIndicator::SetText (  const WString &  text  )  [inline]
